description: Domain Structure Responsibilities Must Not Reference Themselves

do.description: Responsibilities list only collaborators, not the concept itself
content: Responsibilities list only collaborators, not the concept itself
Correct: Agile Bot: Loads workflow: Workflow, Bot Config (no self-reference)
Use verb-noun format for responsibilities without repeating concept name
Correct: Project: Manages workflow state: Workflow, Project Bot State, File System
Responsibilities describe what the concept does, collaborators show who it works with
Correct: Workflow: Orders behavior action steps: Agile Bot, Bot Behavior

dont.description: Don't include the concept name in the responsibility description
content: Don't include the concept name in the responsibility description
Wrong: Agile Bot: Agile Bot loads workflow: Workflow, Bot Config (self-reference)
Don't repeat the concept name in responsibility text
Wrong: Project: Project manages workflow state: Workflow, Project Bot State ('Project' appears twice)
Don't reference the concept itself in collaborators list
Wrong: Workflow: Manages behavior transitions: Workflow, Project (Workflow references itself)
